definition: drink made by steeping and boiling and fermenting rather than distilling, to sit or let sit in boiling water so as to extract the flavor
details:
noun
- drink made by steeping and boiling and fermenting rather than distilling
= synonyms: brewage
verb
- to sit or let sit in boiling water so as to extract the flavor
= example: to sit or let sit in boiling water so as to extract the flavor
- to prepare by brewing
= example: to prepare by brewing
